meanings.definition: To be reborn in another body after death.
meanings.sent1: Some people believe they will reincarnate after they die.
meanings.sent2: The idea of reincarnating into a new life is a common belief in some cultures.
meanings.sent3: If I were to reincarnate, I would want to come back as a bird and fly high in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature made her feel like she would reincarnate as a beautiful flower in her next life.
meanings.sent5: The concept of reincarnating as a different person is both mysterious and fascinating.

meanings.definition: To bring back into existence or use.
meanings.sent1: The artist decided to reincarnate an old painting by adding new colors and details.
meanings.sent2: After many years, the company decided to reincarnate their classic product with modern features.
meanings.sent3: The chef's creative idea was to reincarnate a traditional dish into a gourmet masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The old building was reincarnated into a trendy cafe, attracting many customers.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer was able to reincarnate vintage styles into a new, trendy collection.
